summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3215 for the improvement of Angeline Street, from 39th Avenue South to 42nd Avenue South, all in the City of Seattle by the construction of concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 39732, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
